import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all products
getProducts:function getProducts(){return axios.get("/api/products/");},// create 
createProduct:function createProduct(body){return axios.post("/api/products/new",body);},// updates
changeProduct:function changeProduct(id){return axios.put("/api/products/"+id);},//delete
deleteProduct:function deleteProduct(id){return axios.delete("/api/products/"+id);}};
